product_name: REI Airflyte Warm Tights - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's plus-size REI Airflyte Warm Tights are designed for cold-weather training on your favorite trails and urban routes. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and offers 4-way stretch for comfort as you move; a brushed inner face provides lightweight insulation. Fabric's UPF 50+ sun protection and reflective trim provide day and night coverage. Ergonomic seams prevent chafing and enhance mobility. Elastic drawcord waist secures the fit. Women's plus-size REI Airflyte Warm Tights also include a handy interior coin pocket.
short_description: The women's plus-size REI Airflyte Warm Tights are designed for cold-weather training on your favorite trails and urban routes.
